name: 15.6” B156XTN04.1 - Matte LCD Screen Replacement,1366x768 HD, 30-pin EDP Connector, top and Bottom mounting Brackets
short_description: SPECIFICATIONS – LCD screen size is measured DIAGONALLY at 15.6 inches. Connector Type: 30-pin eDP Screen Size: 15.6 inches (diagonal active display) Resolution: 1366 × 768 (HD) Finish: Matte (anti-glare) Physical Dimensions: 359.5mm (W) × 223.8mm (H) × 3.8mm (D) Active Area: 344.232mm (W) × 193.536mm (H) Mounting Brackets: Top and Bottom
Please ensure compatibility with your laptop. The screen size must be 15.6 inches measured diagonally and NOT a touchscreen. This is a widescreen display with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

FEATURES - Your LCD LED laptop replacement screen produces sharp and detailed images with smooth transitions, making it ideal for various applications, from web browsing to video editing on your 15.6-inch widescreen laptop. With its easy-to-install design, you can get your laptop back up and running quickly!

Compatibility Check: ● Confirm your laptop’s exact model number and current screen part number. ● Ensure your laptop uses a 30-pin eDP connector, as other versions may differ. A screen with different specifications WILL NOT work with your system.
WARRANTY - We offer a 3-month warranty, a 30-day money-back guarantee, and lifetime after-sales support services. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us!
